video_prompt: Zoom in to a young woman's face, her expression subtle. Her eyes subtly shift, glinting with a changing light. Her thick lashes subtly flutter. The vibrant red eyeshadow gleams, its glitter effect subtly catching shifting light on her eyelid and beneath her lower lash line. Her glossy red lips subtly part then close, reflecting movement. Soft shadows subtly play across her contours as the light subtly changes.
image_prompt: Close-up, eye-level profile of a young woman's face (eyebrow to chin). White background. Features soft, desaturated peach skin with rosy blush and subtle texture. Focus on a large, dark, glistening eye with long, thick lashes and vibrant red-orange glitter eyeshadow. Defined by fine dark eyeliner and a shaped eyebrow. Rich, glossy red lips. Front lighting with soft shadows. Hyperrealistic/illustrative style, emphasizing eyes and lips.
refined_video_prompt: Camera slowly pushes in as a woman's subtle expression gently evolves. Her eyes subtly shift, glinting as light continuously changes, and her lashes delicately flutter. Glitter on her eyelids and lower lash line dynamically catches and releases shifting reflections. Her lips subtly part, then close, reflecting movement across their surface. Dynamic shadows continuously play and reform across her facial contours as the illumination subtly transforms.
